alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lamar; Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 4:41PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Monroe, northeastern Upson, northwestern Crawford and southeastern Lamar Counties through 515 PM EST... At 441 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Collier to Yatesville to Lincoln Park, and moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Barnesville, Forsyth, Yatesville, Culloden, Aldora, Bolingbroke, Dames Ferry, Redbone Crossroads, Russellville, Brent, Musella, Redbone, Logtown, Collier and Plant Scherer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for central and west central Georgia.
